description: Silk Road Bitrunners presents an immersive Bitcoin metaverse adventure, merging the world of .bitmap with the vibrant GTA V RP Server universe. Gain access by reaching out through Twitter DM, and upon acquisition, each piece is a unique parcel of the blockchain at block 375127. (Game Access by owning GTA V,Steam, and FiveM on your PC.)
name: Silk Road Bitrunners Passports
